summary: Completed comprehensive testing of media library feature for end times sermons. Backend APIs are fully functional with proper premium authentication. Frontend displays correctly with video/audio tabs, weekly update notice, and proper navigation integration. All 8 specified features tested successfully.
passed_tests: Media library API /api/media/all returns 5 videos and 5 audio sermons
Media library requires premium authentication (403 for non-premium users)
Video sermons have correct structure (title, preacher, description, duration, video_url)
Audio sermons have correct structure (title, preacher, description, duration, audio_url)
Weekly update notice present in API response
End times categories included in API response
Landing page features section includes 'End Times Sermons' as premium feature
Navigation bar includes 'Sermons' link with premium crown icon
Media library page displays video and audio tabs with correct counts
Weekly update notice displayed on media library page
End times categories displayed on page
